hibernate-mapping.query: select size from com.adsapient.api_impl.share.Size where sizeId=:SIZEID
select count(s.sizeId) from com.adsapient.api_impl.share.Size s where s.sizeId not in (select b.sizeId from com.adsapient.api_impl.advertizer.BannerImpl b where b.status=:STATUS)
from com.adsapient.api_impl.share.Size s where s.sizeId not in (select b.sizeId from com.adsapient.api_impl.advertizer.BannerImpl b where b.status=:STATUS)
from com.adsapient.api_impl.share.Size s where (s.sizeId not in (select b.sizeId from com.adsapient.api_impl.advertizer.BannerImpl b where b.status=:STATUS)) or s.sizeId=:SIZEID
select count(sizeId) from com.adsapient.api_impl.share.Size s where s.sizeId not in (select b.sizeId from com.adsapient.api_impl.advertizer.BannerImpl b where b.status=:STATUS and b.userId=:USERID)
from com.adsapient.api_impl.share.Size s where s.sizeId not in (select b.sizeId from com.adsapient.api_impl.advertizer.BannerImpl b where b.status=:STATUS and b.userId=:USERID)
from com.adsapient.api_impl.share.Size s where (s.sizeId not in (select b.sizeId from com.adsapient.api_impl.advertizer.BannerImpl b where b.status=:STATUS and b.userId=:USERID)) or s.sizeId=:SIZEID
